mainText: I am really sorry and I feel really bad about Steve's death. The world lost a genius, one of the greatest geniuses it has ever seen. It is a huge loss for mankind. Unfortunately, there are really few people like Steve, very intelligent and that use the intelligente for making the world better. Unfortunately, we will never see him again showing new apple products, "remaking" the way we see the world, technology, inventions... I really think Steve's death is one of the biggest losses mankind has seen in this century.
author: Robert
